    Anjihai Grand Canyon, Xinjiang, China
    July 2025

    Mengchu Li

    1901, Guanghua East Main Tower
    Handan Campus, Fudan University
    Shanghai, China

    I am a fifth-year PhD student in the School of Mathematical Sciences at Fudan University, majoring in pure mathematics under the supervision of Prof. Meng Chen. My research focuses on birational geometry. Currently, I am working on problems related to the birational geometry of foliations, particularly the foliated minimal model program and other related topics. Here is my CV.

    Preprints

    • MMP for generalized foliated threefolds of rank one. arXiv preprint. (submitted) arXiv

    • Volume of algebraically integrable foliations and locally stable families. joint with Jingjun Han, Junpeng Jiao, Jihao Liu. To appear in Trans. Amer. Math. Soc. arXiv
